player.noVoice: You must be in a voice channel.
player.noSameVoice: You must be in the same voice channel the bot is in.
player.vcRestrict: You're not allowed to use the bot on the current voice channel.
player.limitReached: You have reached the limit of items in queue for this server.
player.nothingPlaying: Nothing being played in this server.
player.skipForbidden: You're not allowed to skip songs.
player.skipMulti: Did you really try to skip this song **again**?
player.voteSkip: **{1}** voted to skip the current song ({2}/{3}).
player.voteSkipSuccess: Skipping current song ~~with the power of democracy~~.
player.noSauce: Sorry, no sauce for the current item. :C
player.sauce: Here's the sauce of the current item:
